modal.title: A beautiful message
modal.description:
Today is our fifth Valentine's Day together, and I can only think about how lucky I am to have such a small and powerful girlfriend. With your one and a half meters of height, you prove that great things come in small packages – and what an adorable package it is! 😊 I love it when you get annoyed over silly things; you look so cute that I can't take it seriously. 😄 Who would have thought that my favorite pastime would be teasing you just to see that little angry face that makes me laugh? 😜

But seriously, Ana Elizabeth Von Wurmb da Silva, these last five years have been the best of my life. Every day by your side is wonderful, and I wouldn't trade our craziness for anything. You are the person who completes me and makes me want to be better. Thank you for being my partner, my confidant, and my eternally favorite little grumpy one. 💖 I can't wait to continue this journey with you, teasing, laughing, and loving a lot. 💑

With all the love and some laughs, Cleber 😘❤️🥰

personalInfo.summary: A beautiful and animated letter for Valentines's Day.
personalInfo.description: A beautiful and animated letter for Valentine's Day, perfect for expressing your feelings in a charming and engaging way.
